items.sentence: I couldn't have finished that job on time without your help.
You ought to tell Tom that you're planning to take pictures.
You ought to tell Tom that you're planning to join the team.
We kept walking in the same direction, hoping to find water.
It's hard to believe that Tom would walk away from all this.
The jokes that you told us the other day weren't very funny.
I don't like tea, so I generally drink coffee for breakfast.
I'd rather have a room of my own, no matter how small it is.
Tom told me last week that he was going to Boston next week.
It takes a special kind of person to do something like that.
People can choose to start loving, but can't choose to stop.
Tom lives in Australia with his wife and his three children.
Tom told his boss that he thought that Mary should be fired.
Tom thought that the watch that Mary had given him was ugly.
Tom always thought that he'd like to become a forest ranger.
Maybe It's better not to tell Tom what we're planning to do.
Living in town is very different from living in the country.
The laundry I hung up was on the clothesline for three days.
Tom asked me why I didn't want to live in Australia anymore.
The train had already left by the time I got to the station.
